title: Did Paden say that he would "be sick " and resign if he and Harris didn't agree?
subtitle: The so-called elected president's joke failed during an interview with CNN.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: With regard to what he would do if he disagreed with Vice-President-elect Kamala Harris, United States President-elect Joe Biden said: "As I said to Barack, if I reach something where there is a fundamental disagreement between us based on a moral principle, I will have a disease and say I have to resign."
